means: 没有受教育的，没有学问的
使忘却，证明…的虚伪( unteach的过去式和过去分词 )

sentence.Network_en: Wholly untaught, with faculties quite torpid, they seemed to me hopelessly dull.
sentence.Network_cn: 她们完全没有受过教育, 官能十分迟钝, 在我看来笨得毫无希望.

sentence.Network_en: Better be untaught, for ignorance is the root of misfortune.
sentence.Network_cn: 与其不受教育,不如不来世间, 因为无知是不幸的根源.

sentence.Network_en: Better be unboun than untaught, for ignorance is the root of misfortune.
sentence.Network_cn: 与其不受教育,不知不生, 因为无知是不幸的根源.
